DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To examine common potentially modifiable dietary , lifestyle , environmental exposure affect risk recurrence progression bladder cancer . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Detailed information collect patient ' lifestyle exposure risk factor associate bladder cancer use semi-structured questionnaire . A baseline questionnaire administer time diagnosis collect information socio-demographics , environmental exposure , medical history , diet , health-related quality life , social support . Further questionnaire administer regular follow-up visit capture information relate change exposure . A postal questionnaire use collect historical information may require patient check record consult family friend . Patients also ask keep 1-week food , fluid , micturition diary . Patients continue complete questionnaire 3 month annually 5 year . Peer Reviewed Funded Endorsed Cancer Research UK .
